document_data.mainbody:
hinar was a cleric and elder among the centaurs of Guard in the Barony of Bloodstone in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Shinar had a warm and thoughtful personality.
Shinar was a priestess and healer, and could cast low to mid-level healing spells.
She had a son, Vikos. She served on Guards Council of Elders alongside Chief Kiros and War Chief Valon.
In 1358 DR, Shinar and her fellow members of the Council of Elders met Gareth Dragonsbanes party.
